snippet: The I.R.S. should ignore protests on the right and left and crack down on abuse of the tax code.
abstract: Editorial holds that secret money has become the scourge of the political system and needs to be eliminated regardless of the inconvenience to nonprofit groups, whatever their ideology; urges the Internal Revenue Service to ignore the outcry from all partisan political groups over its modest crackdown on the abuse of the tax code and to proceed swiftly ahead.
lead_paragraph: The I.R.S. should ignore protests on the right and left and crack down on abuse of the tax code.

headline.main: Change the Rules on Secret Money
headline.print_headline: Change the Rules on Secret Money
